name: DCS World
description:
Install the non-Steam version of DCS World directly from the Eagle Dynamics website. 
This installer will allow you to play without any other configuration.
notes: To be able to use your Joystick/Hotas  you must configure your game in Lutris. Into "Runner options", check "Show advanced options", scroll down and disable "Autoconfigure joypads".
content:
files:
- client: https://updates.digitalcombatsimulator.com/installers/DCS_World_web.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Eagle Dynamics/DCS World/bin/DCS_updater.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts win10
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /S
    description: Installing client
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  DXVK_HUD: '0'
  env: null
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
  overrides: null
  version: lutris-4.13-x86_64
